query.name: findByExpression
query.sql: SELECT RULE_SET.* FROM RULE_SET,RULE_EXPRESSION WHERE RULE_SET.RULE_EXPRESSION_ID = RULE_EXPRESSION.RULE_EXPRESSION_ID AND RULE_EXPRESSION.CONTEXT = ? AND RULE_EXPRESSION.VALUE = ?

query.name: findByCrfId
query.sql: SELECT RULE_SET.* FROM RULE_SET WHERE RULE_SET.CRF_ID = ? AND RULE_SET.STUDY_ID=?

query.name: findByCrfVersionStudyAndStudyEventDefinition
query.sql: SELECT RULE_SET.* FROM RULE_SET WHERE RULE_SET.CRF_VERSION_ID = ? AND RULE_SET.STUDY_ID=? AND RULE_SET.STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID=?

query.name: findByCrfVersionOrCrfStudyAndStudyEventDefinition
query.sql: SELECT RULE_SET.* FROM RULE_SET WHERE RULE_SET.STUDY_ID=? AND RULE_SET.STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID=? AND (( RULE_SET.CRF_VERSION_ID = ? AND RULE_SET.CRF_ID = ? ) OR (RULE_SET.CRF_VERSION_ID is null AND RULE_SET.CRF_ID = ?))

query.name: findByCrfStudyAndStudyEventDefinition
query.sql: SELECT RULE_SET.* FROM RULE_SET WHERE RULE_SET.CRF_ID = ? AND RULE_SET.STUDY_ID=? AND RULE_SET.STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID=?

query.name: findAllByStudy
query.sql: SELECT RULE_SET.* FROM RULE_SET WHERE RULE_SET.STUDY_ID=?

query.name: getCurrentPK
query.sql: select rule_set_id_seq.currval as key from dual

query.name: removeOrRestore
query.sql: UPDATE RULE_SET SET DATE_UPDATED=sysdate, UPDATE_ID=?, STATUS_ID=? WHERE RULE_SET_ID=?

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE RULE_SET SET DATE_UPDATED=sysdate , UPDATE_ID=? WHERE RULE_SET_ID=?
